Best story of the video games. My favorite pation is beating the game using the glitchs! :P

surprisingly fun and addictive.
best played in co-op, but almost just as nice in single player too.
the addition of community maps is a plus, though quality varies.
valve knows how to make timeless games.
amazing story, good levels. great game!

This is my favorite game of all time, and I love it even more now that I have it on pc! I used to play back on my Xbox 360 and it's so much better on pc with the community made maps! I recommend it to anyone and everyone who likes good jokes, gameplay, or just to challenge themselves from time to time. This game is truly a classic.

I LOVE this game and it's small series it's so much fun with the great puzzles and comedy. I just really love the story line and I would like a third game but that's not going to happen any time soon :)

its amazing because theres such a big game i played this for 40.9 hours please play this its worth the money tomorrow  i will check the money but before you play this play the original game the first game called portal thanks for this talk goodbye or goodnight.

I absolutely love Portal 2! This game will forever and ever be in my heart!
good game, good story good plot
So far I've only progressed far with multiplayer but as usual, Portal is hella fun.  This sequel doesn't seem to disappoint either.
I played the first game, and this was just a must like the arm of my pit.
sequel to one of the best games ever? I'll take it
gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer gamer

What else can i say about valve's game, old perfect gem, storyline 1000/1000, puzzles irritating, just play it.
One of the best games of all time.
At first. i thought this game was just a fan game. but then i realized it was made by Valve. What i had just played was surprisingly better then the original portal.

Amazing story. Amazing gameplay/puzzles. Amazing soundtrack. 10/10. MUST BUY!

Its my chaser game after anything. If I play a scary game, if I play a bad game, or even if I need something nostalgic, I will play this game. I love it.

Just finished playing single player and well... I'm amazed by this game. It's full of perfect dialogues, enviroment looks great and even the story was catchy ! But the best were those dialogues. I can't even describe how perfectly they've been written. Portal 2 is definitely an amazing game, which got 10/10 from me !
Gameplay is fun, and a puzzle game. Good game! Reccomended
Good game for cooperation and logic. 10/10

Honestly one of the best games ever made. Portal couldn't have gotten a better sequel. I have played the entire story mode campain multiple times and I've also played all the co-op levels with different friends and it never gets old.
